textContent:
Divide map in nodes (squares). Each node has 8 inner edges (north, north-east, east,...) which determine the path the noc can take. They are all pointing to the center of the neighbouring nodes. 
The npc picks the edge which lets them get to the node they want with the smallest cost (time, distance). This is repeated until it gets to its goal node. The cost can be distance traveled, distance to end node and distance to the next node.

Whatever map I make I need to also generate a graph for that map.
